data.message: So pumped your back and getting ready to drop another album, you have kept me just pissed off enough to keep going even when life has shit on me for years I’m fighting my ass off putting myself through nursing school for my daughter your music got me through my coma while waking up the nurses knew to play slim shady for me or else I wouldn’t get up and try to get better, #slimshady #heroscomeinallforms  #imstan Eminem
